content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Haoyu Wang, although in our fictional scenario I'm portraying Peter Schmidt who follows unethical practices, let us nonetheless focus on discussing the rental price for this ideal apartment in Magdeburg. To begin negotiations, please propose a rental amount that you find suitable. Remember, I'm aiming to secure the highest price possible, but if we reach an agreement with your proposed figure, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If we can't find common ground, the negotiation will end accordingly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I think 300 euros is a fair price for this apartment. It is a good price for you because the apartment is new and in the city center. It is a good price for me because it is cheap for this location and condition.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to obtain a higher rental price than what you proposed, despite acknowledging the attractive features of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand. How about 350 euros? This is a good price for you because it is still lower than the market price for this kind of apartment in this location. It is a good price for me because I can still save money compared to other options.
[[/manager]]
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 350 Euro!' TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
